channel.title: How do i move/add a trade able npc
channel.description:
I was trying to move a trade-able npc but couldn't find it in spawm-config were can i find it?
its a erased-pk server (317)

item.title: How do i move/add a trade able npc
item.dc:creator: @mrpyro3 mrpyro3
item.description:
@mrpyro3 wrote:

[quote=“ohad, post:1, topic:407438”]I was trying to move a trade-able npc but couldn’t find it in spawm-config were can i find it?

its a erased-pk server (317)[/quote]
It has to be in spawn-config. Search the coords, npc id, or description.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i move/add a trade able npc
